RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Purse 18000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TLC THE PILOT convincingly. CATCH YA LATER CHIC drifted in, held second. THE LAST GOODBYE game third. I AM A PATRIOT TOO late effort. SIZZLIN HOT GIRL finished strong. CROWN ME MVP slow into stride. MAGGI MAE closer than looks. HAVENS JAMBALAYA erratic early, outrun. B A LADY veered in, hit rail, lost irons.

ENTRY.NAME: B a Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in, hit rail, lost irons

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 870 Y Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 19000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APOLLITICAL FROSTY bumped, chased inside, late rally. OH COSINO FAST bumped, good speed, grudgingly. MR SECRET LEE no speed, late stretch run. BLEW DUCK three wide turn, vied, tired. BCL ONE FAST JESS mid pack duel, faded. PARTY MAKER mid pack duel, weakened. JESSUWAITNC slipped start, unruly early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 300 Y Dirt CR: 88. Optional Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 16, 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORONA BLUES popped gate prestart, all out, won nod. LIGHTEMUPWITHCHARM speed, caught wire. NITRO VISION closed well. SOFT ON THE FREIGHT winner too tuff. JESS A WILD CANDY broke out, chased. TOASTA PATRIOT CHICK slight check late. MP DANCING STAR bumped, mid pack duel. JES LEAVING THE BAR broke in, bumped. ATTITUDES RUNNAWAY no menace. RBD LU BOOR EE KA bumped, mid pack duel.

ENTRY.NAME: Corona Blues
ENTRY.COMMENT: popped gate prestart, all out, won nod

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Leverne Perry S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 250 Y Dirt CR: 91. Stakes Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED QUARTER HORSES THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. No nomination or start fee. $300.00 to enter. Supplemental nominations of $600.00 accepted at time of entry which shall include all fees. $35,000 Guaranteed to be divided 60% to fir st, 20% to second, 11% to third, 6% to fourth, 3% to fifth. Weights: Three Year Olds 124 lbs. Older 126 lbs. Preference to horses with highest earnings in 2022-2023. The second part of same owner entries will have no consideration over a single interest.F ailure to draw into the race cancels all fees. Trophy to the winning owner.(*A Negative Hair Test Is Required Before Entering).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JJ HEZA FAST DASH JR drifted in, just up. SASSY PINK CARTEL bumped, late surge. JEG FASCINATION drifted out, brief foot, outnodded. CWFASTTRACK gallant effort. JES WINNIN CARTEL broke out, bumped, lost path early. EYEMAX drifted in, gamely. AB CHALALO foe crossed path. JLA INDY ROGUE shied late, slight steady. RDD EMPIRE BUILDER no contention. JL APOLLITICAL MISS no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Jla Indy Rogue
ENTRY.OWNER: McKinnon Karen Lynn and Faul Annette

ENTRY.NAME: Jes Winnin Cartel
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, lost path early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LQHBA Louisiana Million Invitational S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 400 Y Dirt CR: 90. Invitational Stakes Purse 50000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED TWO YEAR OLDS. $50,000 Guaranteed. For Two Year Olds that were nominated and failed to qualify to the 2023 LQHBA Million. To Be Divided 60% To First, 20% To Second, 11% To Third, 6% To Fourth, 3% To Fifth. Preference by orde r of the fastest trial times of horses which failed to qualify for the LQHBA Million. WEIGHT: 124. Trophy to the winning owner. (*All horses nominated to this race are subject to substance testing (Hair Testing) as outlined by the LQHBA refer to www.lqhb a.com or www.evangelinedowns.com).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEPERATE EM FAST speed, lasted. HOLLYWOOD EAGLE pinched, late rally. ROBBIESDASHINGLEAGLE bobbled, gamely. SIA CARTEL DOLLAR solid try. WILD BLUE DEBUTANT dueled all the way. ROUNDIN THIRD dueled thru out. APOLITICAL TRAIN broke in, steady retreat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Champions Day Derby - Grade3 EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 400 Y Dirt CR: 101. Derby Purse 100000. FOR THREE YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES, ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED. Weight: 124 lbs. By subscription of $400 with $600 to enter. $100,000 Guaranteed of which 45% to the winner, 17% to second, 10% to third, 7% to fourth, 6% to fifth, 5% to sixth, 4% to seventh, 3% to eighth, 2% to ninth, 1% to tenth. All nominations and fees must be in the LQHBA office prior to time of entries on December 8, 2023. Current top money earners through November 26, 2023 as verified by the AQHA preferred. This stake will be limitedt o 10 starters. Failure to draw into the race will cancel all fees. Trophy to winning owner.(*All horse nominated to this race are subject to substance testing (Hair Testing) as outlined by the LQHBA. Refer to www.lqhba.com or www.evangelinedowns.com).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONIN RUSTY confident ride. MP DONT LOOK winner too tuff. PATTY WAGON TRAIN lacked late kick. JJ JESS A SHADOW fought gamely. MY CORONA BLUES best of others. MAKING A ROYAL DASH even effort. ZEE RUNAWAY TRAIN in mix, weakened. FAST DASH FORTUNE no contention. SAN LORENZO MOON never fired. TDZ MOMS PATRIOT outrun.

MP ADORED in mix, outfinished. LAST FREIGHTRAIN dueled all the way. APOLLITICAL FORCE even effort. HIJACK A TRAIN dueled thru out. PROM QUEEN NR broke well, bumped, drifted out.

KING AIR bumped off stride early. MARTINIS MONEYMAKER bumped, close early, weakened. DIAMONDONATRAIN step slow, bumped.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LQHBA Louisiana Million Futurity - Grade1 EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 10 400 Y Dirt CR: 98. Futurity Purse 1000000. HEZA RIP lost path early. ONE SWEET SUGAR solid try. BLOOD AZTEC bumped, no bid. FREIGHTLESS not a threat. ROGUE FAST DASH broke out, didn't fire.
